\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

   % https://q.uiver.app/#
   \begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
   	\bullet \& {\bullet\oplus \bullet} \& \bullet \\
   	\bullet \& \bullet \& \bullet \\
   	\bullet \& \bullet \& \bullet
   	\arrow["{\binom if}", from=1-1, to=1-2]
   	\arrow["{(f',-i)}", from=1-2, to=1-3]
   	\arrow["i", tail, from=2-1, to=2-2]
   	\arrow["f", from=2-1, to=3-1]
   	\arrow["d", two heads, from=2-2, to=2-3]
   	\arrow["{f'}", from=2-2, to=3-2]
   	\arrow[equals, from=2-3, to=3-3]
   	\arrow["{i'}", tail, from=3-1, to=3-2]
   	\arrow["{d'}", two heads, from=3-2, to=3-3]
   \end{tikzcd}
   \end{document}
